mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.title AS "title", a.image AS "image", a.source AS "source", a.company_name AS "companyName", a.company_address AS "companyAddress", a.find_date AS "findDate", a.content AS "content", a.status, a.create_date AS "createDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", u2.name AS "user.name", u2.mobile AS "user.mobile"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_complaint( id, user_id, title, image, source, company_name, company_address, find_date, content, status, create_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{title}, #{image}, #{source}, #{companyName}, #{companyAddress}, #{findDate}, #{content}, #{status}, #{createDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cms_complaint SET user_id = #{userId}, title = #{title}, image = #{image}, source = #{source}, company_name = #{companyName}, company_address = #{companyAddress}, find_date=#{findDate}, content = #{content}, remarks = #{remarks}, status=#{status} WHERE id = #{id}
